name: Neighborhood_13
description:
Neighborhood_13 is a top-down shooter horror game.

You are an elite agent of the ETI, a government agency which investigates extraterrestrial activity. People have been disappearing from a place called Neighborhood 13, and the ETI suspects aliens are involved. Your mission is to go to Neighborhood 13 and investigate. On the way to Neighborhood 13, your helicopter is struck down by lightning. You must find supplies to repair your helicopter and make it back to base safely.
